content.prompt: The “Three-Fifths Compromise” originally contained in the Constitution referred to the

choices.label: proportion of states permitted to practice slavery
rate at which one slave counted toward congressional representation
number of African Americans who could vote
number of adult women who could vote

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
